# Inflict Light Damage (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Artificer Spells|Artificer 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Construct touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Eberron Campaign Setting (WotC), pg. 112

When laying your hand upon a construct, you transmute its structure to deal 1d8 points of damage +1 point per caster level (maximum +5).
